title: been back for a week and mmm

replies.body: haha, i've spent maybe a few grand, but i just came back , i wanted skins
I remember the first time I asked Riot support how much I spent haha. Wasn't sure if I was meant to be proud of that amount or not.

Surely as an employee of Riot its part of your duty to support the company :3
haha this was before I was a Rioter =P

HAHA, if u add my vip shemale account in, and few others ive spent a good 1200$, i'll bne honest few months ago i bought a Pax account for like 400$ and the little prick got it permd banned, so i lost the account and my money, then i just made my cs riven account main account and yeah, haha how does one get hired by riot

My main advice would be

1) know what you want to do for Riot/League of Legends
2) Already be doing that in the community

But here are some good FAQ's on Linkedin

how much have u spent? haha i'm curios.
Cant remember exactly now but it was around $600+ on my personal account. But before then I used to work with a community group in OCE and spend probably another 600+ on RP cards for giveaways =P
